parameters.name: OtherCurve
parameters.description: Curve to intersect with this curve

parameters.name: ThisStartPoint
parameters.description: Array containing the start point of this curve

parameters.name: ThisEndPoint
parameters.description: Array containing the end point of this curve

parameters.name: OtherStartPoint
parameters.description: Array containing the start point of otherCurve

parameters.name: OtherEndPoint
parameters.description: Array containing the end point of otherCurve

title: ICurve.IntersectCurve
description: Gets a set of points that represent the intersection of two trimmed curves.
signature:
System.Object IntersectCurve( 
   System.Object
OtherCurve
,
   System.Object
ThisStartPoint
,
   System.Object
ThisEndPoint
,
   System.Object
OtherStartPoint
,
   System.Object
OtherEndPoint
)

parameters.name: OtherCurve
parameters.description: Curve to intersect with this curve

parameters.name: ThisStartPoint
parameters.description: Array containing the start point of this curve

parameters.name: ThisEndPoint
parameters.description: Array containing the end point of this curve

parameters.name: OtherStartPoint
parameters.description: Array containing the start point of otherCurve

parameters.name: OtherEndPoint
parameters.description: Array containing the end point of otherCurve

returns: Array containing the intersection points (see Remarks )
remarks:
The array of doubles returned contains the x, y, z location of the tessellation points and a code for each point that indicates the intersection class:
[
x1, y1, z1, k1, x2, y2, z2, k2....
]
Return codes are defined in
swIntersectionType_e
.
